titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a President pro tempore of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a President pro tempore of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Notifies the House of Representatives of the election of Ted Stevens of Alaska as president pro tempore of the Senate.
